content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard for the fourth of july fireworks and we noticed an orange glowing orb. i am located on the south shore of long island and while facing the west, we noticed an object that seemed to consistently glow. i looked around and noticed some airplanes in the area being that we are located near an airport yet this object did not blink like the planes. it was moving in a slow pace headed. it began at 9pm and appeared in and out of site for the following 45 minutes. it faded out each time in the same location. my family and i are convinced we saw something out of the normal.
content.summary: During fireworks, a constant orange glowing sphere glided across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving from the field and looked up because it was cold and windy and the sky was crystal clear.I looked at the stars and noticed one that thought it was a movinh satellite.It was followed by two more that didn't have a steady orbit but moved.The first one turned to the west and the other two continued straight. i looked for them in the sky and i noticed something passing infront of my view of the stars black and soundless having only 3 star like lights . it followed the same nw direction until i lost it in the horizon when it mixed with the other stars. during the time it was above our heads some tool on the table seemed to magnetize and my metal ring was stuck to it. the dogs we have were barking but when they were above us they made crying like barkings. the weather was windy and we had no flights yesterday because of the weather.I was with my boyfriend.
content.summary: Triangular 3-star dark no sound and some starlike orbs all pulsating the orbs kind of chaged color

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and my lady were walking the dog watching fireworks when my lady said look at that there were 5 lighted objects moving like a kite they looked like they were made up of many little lights slowly moving back and forth i took one picture and a short video clip i never seen anything like it in my life. what a trip!!!
content.summary: Five lighted objects moving in a s pattern like a kite

content.detailedDescription:
1.Looking out the window
2.The dark spots inside the 8 shaped ufo
3.Thought it was a plane or helicopter until noticed it hovered like nothing seen before
4.Object hovering while wobbling ascending into large cloud
5.Curious and strange, called another person to witness the event and to make sure im not halucinating, filmed the event with iphone 4 but object doesnt seem to appear on video... after sighting left with questiona.
6. lost sight of object when entered large cloud
content.summary: Ufo shaped like an 8 hovering just under cloud then floats away into imense cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the army at the time, and stationed at ft, huachuca.  i had an apartment off post that i stayed at with a girlfriend.  over the years, we saw at least three ufos together, and saw several individually there in sierra vista.  during the time that i was stationed there everyone i know saw numerous strange lights and objects in the sky.

one morning, it had to be a saturday or sunday, my girlfriend and i went for a walk together.  we wandered the length of a canal that is bordered by 7th on the west, coronado on the east, and just barely south of carmelita dr, behind the houses that face north on carmelita.

we came to a perfect circle of sand, and inside of that circle was a perfectly round circle impression.  i don't remember the diameter of the impression, but it was probably between five and nine feet.  in the center of the circle, facing north, was a severed cow's head.

the sand was out of place, since everything else around there was dirt.  there were no footprints, track marks, or anything like that anywhere in the sand.  i figured that whoever made the circle impression would have to have left tracks, or at least some marks into, or out of, the sand, where they walked up to the circle, or placed the head, but there was no indication that anyone had tried to cover tracks either.

there were no burn marks, no other body parts, and no blood.  the head was fresh, and therefore should have been bleeding, but there was no blood under the head.  i walked through the circle to examine the head.  there were two large ticks on the head that looked to have died while trying to feast on it.  i thought that the presence of dead ticks in mid meal was just as strange as finding a head with no footprints or blood.  after all, the ticks would probably not have been on a live cow, and why would they have died on the dead cow?

the girl that i was with was completely uninterested.  that was her standard response to everything out of the ordinary though.  i found it really odd, but forgot about it until recently when i was going through some other ufo experiences that i had out there and have been reporting them to mufon.

there is nothing to say that it was related to the strange lights and experiences we were all having at the time, but coupled with the other weird things that were going on during the weeks prior to, and post, cow head discovery, i figured that it could be relevant.
content.summary: During a spate of ufo sightings, and abduction dreams, found a severed cow head in a sand circle with no blood or footprints

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the fireworks in chillicothe ohio. i didnt notice the object until i got home and looked at the video that i put on youtube. it was a bright object that was traveling southwest very fast and gaining altitude only lasted 1 second on the video but it was not going in the direction of any of the fireworks. i have uploaded a screen shot and the clip of the video showing the object. lots of people were there but not sure if any saw it as i didn't until i reviewed the video.
content.summary: Strange object during fireworks show only seen on the video

content.detailedDescription: Ufo sighting july 4th 2015 time 11:27 p.M. to 11:35 p.M. two ufos were in the south east night sky of los angeles. i came out of the house because of loud eruptions from the fireworks. i turned towards the south east and looked up to see two red orbs lit up brightly about 200 yards apart from one another. the time was around 11:25 pm to 11:27 pm. i watched for a minute or two. i then rushed in the house to get my video camera. i loaded the battery into the video camera which took a couple of minutes. i rushed back outside and turned on my video camera. the lcd screen asked me if i wanted to set a date. i selected no and began to record. the red orbs slowly ascended and continue to separate, i focused on one of the red orbs it was stationary for a few moments. both orbs hovered and slowly ascended and faded out. when i came back in the house the clock on my computer said 11:35 pm. i then uploaded the footage of the orbs and watched the video replay on my computer. i then uploaded the footage to my facebook page.
content.summary: I recorded this ufo around 11:27 pm july 4th from my backyard. there were two red orbs in the night sky brightly lit.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were out shooting fireworks in the back yard. we had just had a bag of fireworks go off after someone had thrown them on the fire, we were checking on everyone when i looked up and noticed an orangish glow in the sky just above the treeline, at first i thought is was someones fireworks but it did not go out so i thought it might have been a star. then it started to move and suddenly got brighter and bigger as it did so i could see a reddish tint to the top of what appeared to be a glowing ball almost like a fire glow. i then asked my cousin's wife and brother-in-law if i was the only one seeing it. they were also watching when it suddenly changed the direction and then a few minutes later it dimmed and then just vanished from the sky. we were all shocked and were talking about it and how it was unfortunate that no one had taken a picture or had even thought about it. my cousin resumed shooting the fireworks and about 15 minutes later another one appeared in the same area as the first one, i was upset because my camera and phone were in the house and there was no way anyone would ever believe me without any physical proof. my brother-in-law and my cousins wife then took out their phones and began recording, my cousins wife's phone would only show the object zoomed at maximum and i am not certain if my brother-in-law got a good recording. as my brother-in-law moved further towards the field to get a better look my kids and his kids noticed the object too, and my niece became very upset. as we thought to go get my father and sister, the object once again turned, dimmed, and disappeared from the sky. i was fascinated by the whole thing, this is not the first time i have seen something in the sky i could not explain but it is the first time that i have seen two in one night in the same place and with so many witnesses.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw the first one and thought it was fireworks being shot off at a distance, then it got brighter and started moving closer to us, then changed direction and disappeared. the second one came about twenty minutes later and done the exact same thing.

content.detailedDescription: I we were in kahanna maui roughly 8:45pm i'm looking out watching fireworks on the beach there was a large gray object moving extremely fast i was afraid i was going to come right at us swooshed over us to the nike sign company starting from the last trailing off to the north i'm never seen anything like it was a gray lighter subject no lights left kind of a light.
content.summary: 2 seconds of an nike swoosh.  over ocean.  light trail.  scared...Thought something was going too crush u.  ghost like feeling

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were all outside doing fireworks in our driveway (6 people all together including myself) my brother saw it first and pointed up and asked what the heck it was, and told me to pull my phone out and record and i did, it was a red/orange almost seemed to be glowing oval/circle like object just flying overhead with no noise and we all saw it and watched it for about a minute before it just disappeared in front of our eyes! my parents couldn't explain it, my dad was in the military before and he couldn't even come close to explaining what it could have been. i have a cousin in broken arrow which isnt far from where i am and they saw the same thing too! i felt really weird after seeing it, i've seen other weird "ufos" all through my life and so has my mom actually so we'll talk about it and theorize things but it just gave me this weird vibe unlike anything else i've ever seen.
content.summary: Red/orange glowing ufo seen during fireworks tonight!

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of independence day 2015 at approximately 8:50-9:30 pm, the family and i gathered at my aunts house to watch the fireworks being displayed at the high school near the neighborhood we were at. i was the first to notice a dim orange glowing sphere-like object nw of where the family and i were. i pointed it out and about 4 or 5 of my family members also witnessed this object. as we watched it move more west, it seems as though whenever it pulsated, it appeared in a different spot in the sky nw and then it just disappeared. this event lasted for nearly a minute and sadly, none of us had decent film technology to record this event because the object was not viewable on the smart phone cameras.  
when i first saw this object, i thought it was a hot air balloon because of the glowing orange, which i thought resembled glows from the flames. three or four of us saw the way it was flying fairly quickly in the west direction. it would be a solid orange color, clearly visible, then sort of pulsate and dissapear for a split second and reappear a solid object again moved slightly west. it was in sight for nearly a minute and then it dissapeared (faded) away into the night sky, and we didn't see the object the rest of the night. i felt both excited and surprised to see this because i had always wanted to witness a ufo in person, and i deeply believe this sphere-like object was either military property, since it was in the direction of los alamos, nm or a ufo.
content.summary: a few family members and i witnessed a glowing orange dim sphere-like object in the night sky pulsating and moving spots, and then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: My friend was bicycling to my house when he met me across my street in (at the time) the chevrolet car dealer parking lot.  he was huffing and puffing pretty hard when he reached me and pointed towards the northeast in the air and told me to look at the silver shiny cloud.  the fact of the matter was that there were no other "clouds" in the sky.  we both said it was a ufo at the same time. the object looked like it was a huge saucer hovering over town to the northeast of my location that was reflecting the setting sun.  i ran into my house on scott lane yelling at my parents to come and see this huge silvery shiny ufo.  at first my parents were apprehensive, but as curious as i was, my parents reluctantly obliged.  i grabbed my camera and took a picture that didn't show the object in it.  my friend hurried home. my parents, neighbors, people out for an evening walk, and i on looked at the previously hovering ufo.  it was slowly, and more importantly, and silently hovering on a straight line from east to west.  the saucer then tilted and continued moving away from us onlookers.  i would say it was about 45 minutes from start to finish. we were all in awe.  since then i have seen numerous white, star like lights (that clearly weren't planes, helicopters, or satellites) moving erratically in the night sky in various locations in the area i reside over the years. i believe!
content.summary: Observed large shiny saucer.

content.detailedDescription:
before midnight july 4.Seeing and watching fireworks in my backyard i
i saw a glowing red orange orb coming my direction.Slowly as i stared at it was about 200 300 ft it made a 90 degree turn,north.I ran to the front yard so i see it better because i thought it was going over my roof top but it changed direction north ,slowly hovered over the trees and homes.Now i could see it from the rear.It seemed disc shape.Red orange glowing orb.Maintaining a slow speed.Approximately 10-15 mph until it disappeared.
content.summary: Before midnight..Red-orange glowing light coming towards my backward between the trees. made 90 degree turn proceeded north away from neighborhood.Proceeded away at speed approximately 15 mph.I first thought it was some kind of firework.It was intelligent

content.detailedDescription: I was at work sweeping the floors and through the window by door (drapes are see through) i saw a bright red light.It was 12 am 12/5/2015. i went outside right away and it was moving across the sky slowly. it was lower then a airplane would be and it had no sound. i went back inside real quick to see if i could get a video of it from my phone, but didn't get a very good shot of it. then it got smaller and went higher in the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: Red light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were outside watching fireworks when we saw about 7 orbs of light coming from the north east.  the first few traveled from the northeast in a straight line to the southwest.  they appeared to be very high in the sky.  however, the later orbs began on this trajectory, but made sharp angle changes in motion to the north (in one case) and towards the east in others.  one actually double back on its original path.

initially believed that they might be chinese lanterns given the holiday but the great height at which they apppeared made this seem less likely.  the changes in motion observed, which appeared to be self-directed (no wind was evident, and the directional changes were inconsistent with one another) also make this hypothesis problematic.
content.summary: Orange orbs exhibiting directed motion.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw the weirdest thing,,,, i was looking southwest when a bright red object appeared from behind the tree's. it was moving west slowly and was too big to be a helicopter even tho that's what i originally thought it was., then i thought it might be some sort of fireworks since it was the 4 th of july. and even a meteor or something crossed my mind because it was so unusual. it looked big. as i said to big for a helicopter.  i see national guard helicopters all the time (or hear then)   it appeared to be about a block or two away and a few hundred ft off the ground.. (unless it was bigger than i thought)and moving slowly as a helicopter might move.  it suddenly appeared to get significantly smaller as if the lights shining on it were lessened somehow. it didn't just change like a switch was flipped it was almost as if it faded taking a second or two .. (i know crazy huh?)  (still a bright red though) at this point my mother who i had called was also observing. it continued east for about 5 or 6 seconds traveling what appeared to be about two blocks. then slowly arced to the south. it never appeared as if they were lights but rather something was shining light on it. it was illuminated in a bright red light. it didn't look like the light of an aircraft but rather something illuminated. as i said it turned and started south gaining altitude and picking up speed ,,,,, quickly . at this moment i thought to get a camera but, within about 6 or 7 seconds it was just a pinpoint of light that faded at about 15 degree above the horizon.. when i first saw it i thought it was a low flying helicopter, but i never heard a sound. a helicopter i would have heard. a small plane can't move that fast. i never could discern a shape but just a bright red ball. glad i wasn't the only one who saw it, weird !
content.summary: Red glowing light observed over cumberland indiana

content.detailedDescription:
I attended a neighborhood fireworks display.  during this event i noticed a glowing/firey, orb/blob of light, out of the corner of my eye.  i started to watch it.  it just seemed like it wasn't quite normal.  something didn't seem right.  as i continued watching this object i noticed that it started to change shape and color.  it was moving very slowly.  i thought at first that it was a plane, but i knew that it just didn't seem to act like a plane.  it was changing directions in straight lines. 90 degree turns.  it then accelerated and grew in size and changed into a bright white light and then disappeared into a gap in the sky.

several minutes later the object just reappeared, however, it had a 2nd object with it.  the 2 objects then proceeded to do a slow dance around each other.  sometimes they would be side by side, then on top of one another. all the time while they were doing this dance, they were continuing to change shape and color and brightness.  this dance continued for approximately 2 minutes.  then 1 of the objects, the 2nd one, just disappeared.  the original stay for a little while longer, appox. 20 secs, and then it too blinked out.

after about 5 minutes they both returned but individually.  first one, then the other.  this time they basically stayed in the same positions that they appeared.  they were more faint this time.  then they just blinked out.  but the blinking out was done by getting brighter then a few flashes of light and they were gone.

this whole process took approximately half an hour from the time i first noticed the original object.

i have video of these objects.  in the videos, it is possible to see the changing of the shape and color of these objects. at times the objects were round, other times they were diamond, donut, oblong (from top to bottom),flat shaped.  it was possible to see stick like projections from the top of the objects at times.  other times theses sticks were on the bottom of the objects.  

i would estimate that these objects were anywhere from 1-5 miles from me.  at their closest approach, they were very bright and difficult to look at because of how bright they were.  when they were at their closest point it was like a firey blob of red/orange/white light.  it appeared to my eyes that the objects were sort of like liquid but shimmering with puddle like ripples.

when they disappeared for the last time i remained for another half an hour to see if they would return.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I witnessed and video taped 2 objects

content.detailedDescription: 4th of july, outside with the family watching fireworks, about 10:45pm central time. dark sky rural area without "city lights" and clear no clouds, stars visible. we observed 3 individual  lights 2 in close proximity and one following about 20 seconds later, no obvious structure approximately 800-1000 ft in elevation traveling from se to nw. about 15 seconds travel time from horizon to horizon.  this object was a shock to see because it appeared so close without sound, i could not hear any sound from objects, my wife said she could hear a strange fan noise but no one else could hear any sound from any of the objects. there was no visible structure to the object but the first 2 were glowing red/orange and there 3rd one was a brighter orange glow.  we are in proximity to two air force bases and are very familiar with military aircraft and operations and this was the first time these objects have been observed.
content.summary: Glowing sphere/orb very fast no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:30pm. we were all looking up trying to see fireworks when i saw a red and green flashing object. at first we figured it was a drone but soon realized it was much to high to be one. it was traveling over us when it stopped, changed direction, then began to ascend. as it ascended i noticed what i thought was a star next to it. all of a sudden the "star" began to get closer to the original object. they looked as if they were going to meet. the original object then started to head away from the other object and they both started to travel north. we tried to watch it as long as we could until they were too high for us to see anymore.
content.summary: Blinking red and green lights about 100ft above. ascended, met with another craft, traveled together north.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th 2015 at 8:35 p.M. many neighbors of the city terrace, ca. 90063 community were able to admire a flying unknown obtect. 
t
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Rectangular flying object with red/wihit and green lights.

content.detailedDescription: I seemed to me in a trance. when i awoke i felt disturbed but couldn't figure out why. as i sat down on my bed i felt a sore spot on the back of my right calf. it was a hard bump as if a piece of metal was inside. but there was no wound on the skin. it is still there.
content.summary: I heard a loud wind in our trees, all else seemed calm, i saw a bright light that hovered above electric lines in a eucalyptus tree behind our house. i was mesmerized and stood there a short moment but when i awoke it much more time had passed.

content.detailedDescription: My mom my sister and me was siting on there porch and saw it flying straight over my sisters house in thomasville north carolina at around 11:49 pm i saw it was flying under the clouds it looked like a triangle that looked like it was pulsating kind of looked like fire it flew to the north it was not a balloon or anything i thought it might of been because its fouth of july but we noticed it was flying straight towards the wind my mom and sister and i did not know what it was we lost sight when it flew by the trees but about 30 minutes after a military jet flew in the same direction
content.summary: Orange firey looking triangle like flying straight wind pushing towards object so was not balloon

content.detailedDescription:
I looked up at the moon to admire how pretty it was; i saw something move north of my neighbor's house in the sky.  at first i thought it was some weird 4th of july stunt, but then it looked like an orange plane as it got bigger (nearer).  it traveled nw until it looked like it was so small it disappeared from view--similar to how we watch a plane as it gets too far away to still see.  

at first i was upset and thought it was some weird "drone" toy plane, but orange-ish, lit up.  then i realized that it was getting bigger--similar to the shape of a plane.  i watched it travel across the sky.  i  became worried that it might be a plane up high in the sky that was engulfed in flames (also a post 911 recurring nightmare theme for me--even after all these years).  i went inside to tell another occupant and this person came outside and both saw it at its smallest aand then it disappeared.  

i am still worried that it might have been a plane, but i don't think it could've have still worked that well to travel that far that fast (if it had been engulfed in flames).  so i now wonder if it was a ufo.  not necessarily feeling great about even saying that word, but it was unlike anything i'd ever seen. and it definitely happened.  the other occupant noticed that it was definitely orange--similar to the color of the moon at that exact time.
content.summary: It looked like an orange lit up shape of a plane in the sky:  larger when i first saw and then traveled n/nw and disappeared as though then too small to see

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my 2 adult daughters were in our backyard watching a fireworks display. during a break in the display we observed a orange reddish object moving south to north in the sky- we thought perhaps it was a piece of firework, but this object remained intact, did not dissolve, and its motion was completely straightline, then it stopped, made a slight vertical motion, and went straight up. we lost sight of it. i thought it might have been the iss as i am an amateur astronomer and we look out for the iss when it is visible in our sky. but the iss was not visible to our area on this date. we simply ignored it until, appx, ten minutes later, we saw a second orb, same color, same south to north trajectory, and we followed it north appx half a block, as far as we could see. i then told my daughter to go get my binoculars in case we saw a 3rd one.  we did, almost ten minutes later. my daughter tracked this one through binoculars.  she said it had a distinct round shape, no lights, and she followed it with binoculars about 3/4 of a block before she said she lost it in the night sky.  also, my younger daughter caught the object the first time on her cellphone.  we have no idea what we saw, but i do know that fireworks don't travel mechanically straight the way this object did.  i honestly thought we were seeing a star when it first appeared, but then it moved north. as i said, this was no firework. i told my daughter to save the cellphone video as she tried to upload it to my computer and it didn't work.
content.summary: Three orb shaped objects moving mechanically in a straight line south to north

content.detailedDescription: We were having a bonfire watching fireworks with children when we noticed 3 red orange dots 1 which sped off and the other 2 almost hovered. this happened in several groups. as they would also go north they would fade out into white and dissapear, but not all off them just some. they would also travel at various speeds and several just hovered and dissapeared.
content.summary: 3 in a pattern hovering then take off, multiples up to 12

content.detailedDescription: After finishing off fireworks at a friends family 4th of july get together, i noticed this really bright orange ball slowly floating through the sky, above the tree line. i pointed it out but everyone wrote it off as possibly a plane but then another one flew by and somewhat hovered then zipped off. the pattern continued for about 20 minutes. everyone that had wrote it off as a plane were getting binoculars out to try and see what it was but no luck.
content.summary: After finishing firing off fireworks our group noticed multiple glowing orange orbs flying in a straight path for about 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: On the 4th of july i was outside with my family, my daughter, mom, and step dad. we were enjoying the fireworks in the sky when i noticed a glowing ball of fire, yellow/orange/pink colors, appeared from nothing. i alerted my family to come see this strange thing in the sky and they were all amazed. it flew slowly east to west three times, each time disappearing to nothing. all my family members observed this. a few times we saw the same object flash and disappear in different locations close to where we observed it. i had goose bumps all up my arms and was in prayer as my family was also. my daughter and i took video with two different phones, one an apple 6 and the other an android one plus one.
content.summary: Glowing ball of fire

content.detailedDescription: After shooting off some fireworks around 9 several people and i were in the backyard eating and talking and noticed there was several orange yellow spheres passing through the sky. we thought at first they were just some fireworks or drones or something like that, however they were moving very slowly. we watched several pass and then began to take more notice as they kept coming along the same path. they would all head in one direction slowly then take off in the next direction. about 12-16 passed through this same path. they would take off past our line of sight due to trees being in the way. the movements were very linear and the directional changes sharp. since it changed speeds and directions so quickly we couldn't figure out what it was. we all had time to take a couple videos and such, but since it was dark it literally looks like a couple small orbs in the sky. in person they looked much larger.
content.summary: Several orange/red/yellow spheres all heading linearly behind each other about 100 yards apart then changed directions and took off

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside watching fireworks in my neighborhood and between about 9:25 pm and 10 pm i saw several glowing orange fire looking orbs.  i would estimate they were all around 2000 foot altitude during most of the time i observed them in their horizontal movements. the first one i saw was moving east to west almost over head, but a little north of me.  it pause and held stationary a couple of times and continued moving west then it made about a 45 degree turn to northwest and moved out getting smaller until it disappeared.  it looked like when it turned nw it also began to ascend and probably disappeared into the high light overcast.  a little while later i either spotted the same one or another one to the west and it was moving back to the east about the same altitude and appeared to get larger the closer it got.  then it reversed course and moved back west disappearing.  a little while later i looked back to the west and saw an orb again just hovering in the sky.  after about 30 seconds or so i saw another second one also in the sky hovering a little lower to the south of the first one.  then the one to the south began to climb and move north toward the first one and climbed above it.  then they both moved off to the northwest ascending and again disappeared.  i saw another come in from the west and then it was like it shut off its glow, but i felt i could see a shadow move across overhead and on to the east.  i could not make out a definite shape. a couple minutes later i saw an orb moving back to the west from the east, but further north than it was when i thought it crossed more overhead of me.  i think it was the same one that turned somewhere to the east of me and moved a little north and came back to the west.  i think i saw a couple more in the distance to the northeast momentarily.  none of them made any noise.  they all glowed a bright orange, kind of like fire at times, but in a round ball shape.  i got a short video of the two moving to the west of me which is about 1 minute 12 seconds long taken with my nikon l21 camera.  i got one still picture of one to the northeast of me.  in the video the large bright light near the bottom is a street light one block away west from my viewing location with the two orange orbs high above it.  there are a couple flashes with some fireworks along the edges of the video. the orbs moved roughly at speeds typical of an aircraft, but a couple movements were what i would judge to be much faster than any planes of which i'm aware.  also when they changed directions it was instant, not like a turn typically made by aircraft.  there was no wind, it was dead calm, my neighbor across the street has an american flag on a flag pole and it was dead still against the pole with no movement all evening.  they were not chinese lanterns because they moved in all directions including both up and down.  there were no red, white, or green lights or flashing lights associated with the objects.  they traveled way too far from one horizon to the other and could not be any civilian type of drone. this is my very first sighting of what i think appear to be actual orbs.  i wonder if there will be any other reports from this area.  they seemed to be quite visible and all over the northern hernando county area and a lot of people were outside shooting off fireworks and looking up at the skies.  dscn0219 video is looking west; dscn0221 is a still picture shows the streetlight that was in the bottom of the video; and dscn0222 is a still picture of an orb to the north northeast.  in the high overhead view the viewing location is the red star.  path 1 is the first orb which roughly traveled that path west then northwest pausing and hovering a few times.  path 2 is the second orb which came in from the west, stopped then moved off to the northwest.  paths 3 and 4 were the 2 orbs in the video that moved in from the west stopped then 4 ascended and moved north then both went off to the northwest. path 5 was the 5th sighting of an orb which just moved west then northwest.  path 6 was the orb that came in from the west, stopped, turned off the glow at the black hexagon location and continued east past me overhead.  path 7 i believe was the same one from path 6 now coming back west and then northeast.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several glowing orange orbs seen over about a 45 minute period.
